label: GOAP Agent
bulletPoints: Goal-Oriented Action Planning Agent which is able to play a recreation of the game Fireboy and Watergirl.
Able to dynamically react and plan actions based on player input and game states.

label: Slime Simulation
bulletPoints: Interactive slime mold simulation using p5.js.
Features agent-based modeling and trail following.

label: Barnsley Fern
bulletPoints: Fractal generation using iterated function systems.
Draws the famous Barnsley Fern in real time.
